description:
cmd/go: use filepath.SplitList when inspecting GOPATH

There exists a test case for this condition, but it only runs on unix systems, which neatly dovetails into the code always using ':' as the list separator.

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

On 2013/01/07 20:33:51, iant wrote:
> LGTM

Thank you Ian.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c529f87b63d1 ***

cmd/go: use filepath.SplitList when inspecting GOPATH

There exists a test case for this condition, but it only runs on unix systems, which neatly dovetails into the code always using ':' as the list separator.

R=adg, iant
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7057052

subject: code review 7057052: cmd/go: use filepath.SplitList when inspecting GOPATH
